item.title: Basic usage IHttpClientFactory
item.description: Register it //Startup.cs public void ConfigureServices(IServiceCollection services) { ... services.AddHttpClient(); } Use it //HealthController.cs private readonly IHttpClientFactory _clientFactory; public HealthController(IHttpClientFactory clientFactory) { _clientFactory = clientFactory; }
